PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-06281999-04-150,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the FEDERAL-PROVINCIAL FISCAL ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS by postponing the recovery of overpayments (as a result of population variations) made in the 1996-97 and 1997-98 fiscal years and establishing a formula to allow them to be repaid over a five-year period, and by allowing overpayments made in the 1991-92 to 1995-96 fiscal years to be recovered at the same time.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0178 Publication Date: 1999-04-28
